original_text: Then Judah said to Onan, “Go in to your brother's wife and perform the duty of a brother-in-law to her, and raise up offspring for your brother.”
korean_text: 유다가 오난에게 이르되 네 형수에게로 들어가서 남편의 아우 된 본분을 행하여 네 형을 위하여 씨가 있게 하라

sentences.original_text: Go in to your brother's wife
and perform the duty of a brother-in-law to her
and raise up offspring for your brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네 형을 위해 자손을 일으켜라
